DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine synchronized electrical stimulation device effective treatment dysphagia .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Dysphagia Using Synchronized Electrical Stimulation Device
DOC.detailed_description: - Design : Prospective study - Inclusion criterion patient group : dysphagia symptom confirm video-fluoroscopic swallowing study ( N=9 ) - Inclusion criterion control group : dysphagia symptom , underlie disease ( N=9 ) - Setting : Hospital rehabilitation department - Intervention : Participants apply electrical stimulation `` Synchronized Electrical Stimulation Device ( SESD ) '' - Main outcome measure : high-resolution manometry ( HRM ) parameter include maximal pressure , area integral , rise time , duration velopharynx tongue base , maximal pressure preeupper esophageal sphincter ( UES ) , low pharynx , cricopharyngeus , minimal UES pressure , UES activity time , nadir UES duration . After apply SESD , compare HRM data initial data obtain treatment
